resources.string: インタースティシャル広告

The Ads in HUAWEI X is provided in collaboration with our advertising partners. To provide this service, we need to share certain information about you with these partners, including your city-level location as well as your usage records for the news service.

 For more information about our partners and how your data is processed, please touch here.

 By touching AGREE, you indicate that you agree to share the above personal information with our partners so that they can provide you with personalized advertisements on behalf of their customers, based on interests and preferences identified or predicted through analysis of your personal information. 

You can withdraw your consent at any time by going to [app settings]. 

If you touch SKIP, your data will not be shared with our partners and you will not receive personalized ads.
